Program: Airport planning and development Airport planning and coordination
Audit Remarks: The activity was partially completed. Partial works were done and the project received additional funding of UGX.6.149 which was not fully utilized as the project slowed down in the year under review due to change in designs.
There were no funds allocated to this activity.
The activity was partially achieved. The project works were 60% complete. Relocation of under- ground services and the rainy season interrupted with the progress of works

Planned output: Security search park shelter, equipment, civil infrastructure and electrical works
Audit Remarks: This activity was partially achieved. The civil works for the search park by IBB Inter- national is in advanced stage of completion. The civil works were almost completed. However, the facility may not be put to use because of the required screening equipment which were yet to be procured. Funds were obtained from other Authority areas to deliver the output.
